price: 42. Nabiyow ama korosut kuyab kee ama Qhuraanay atu takriye ankacsa mari keenit yan, kinnih immay usun wohut tirri iyya mara hinnon, tokkel atu aytimaleela taysabbem duddaa? tonnaah atu ama mara tirri haytam madudda aytissinnah usun tucubbusaah wohul qakkaloowa mara akke weenik.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yastamiʿūna ilayka afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma walaw kānū lā yaʿqilūna
